title: Balance Wellness Acupuncture | Herbal Medicine | Austin, TX
description: Balance Wellness helps relieve pain, stress and sleep issues using acupuncture, dry needling and cupping therapy for the Austin community.
sitename: Balance Wellness Acupuncture + Herbal Medicine - Austin, TX
cleaned_text: Austin Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine Specialists Balance Wellness is devoted to helping relieve pain, stress and sleep issues naturally using acupuncture, dry needling, cupping therapy and herbal medicine for the entire Austin community. You deserve to feel good. Your health starts with Balance.
